alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:32AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Wheeler and southeastern Hemphill Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 332 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wheeler, or 14 miles north of Shamrock, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Briscoe, Wheeler and Allison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
